item.title: Sprongle
item.author: me@fishlasers.co.uk (Fish Lasers)
item.description: I made a funny little harmonograph generator. It lives here.

item.title: About
item.author: me@fishlasers.co.uk (Fish Lasers)
item.description:
Welcome to the personal site of FishLasers, a.k.a. A.C.J. Orr.

I am currently a DPhil student in Engineering Science at the University of Oxford. I also lecture in Physics at New College and Brasenose College.

Here I will post various ramblings about my personal projects, which range from theatre to electronics to music.

I maintain a small collection of sound equipment, available to borrow. See my kit list.
